sentences.sContent: I took my dingy volume by the scroop, and hurled it into the dog- kennel, vowing I hated a good book.
sentences.sContent_eng: I took my dingy volume by the scroop, and hurled it into the dog- kennel, vowing I hated a good book.
sentences.sCn: 随灭关门的轧轧声，人拿起人那本肮净的书，用力扔进狗窝里，并发誓人讨厌说有的好书。

synos.tran: 狗屋；养狗场；[建]阴沟；一群狗

phrases.pCn: 美国育犬协会；英国养犬俱乐部

remMethod.val: ken(=can犬) + nel → 狗窝； 注意： 不要和kernel(n. 核心)相混

trans.tranOther: a small building made for a dog to sleep in
